## This is a holding page for Events

We currently have the following events that are available for sign up by emailing [nhs.rcommunity@nhs.net](mailto:nhs.rcommunity@nhs.net):

[RPySOC24](conference24.qmd) in person conference 21 November at [ICC Birmingham](https://www.theicc.co.uk/) **Full please join the Waiting list by email**

[RPySOC24](conference24.qmd) online conference 21 November - tickets are available by completing this [form](https://forms.office.com/e/NBcjv7LVJ4)


[RPySOC24](conference24.qmd) in person conference 22 November at [ICC Birmingham](https://www.theicc.co.uk/) **Full please join the Waiting list by email**

[RPySOC24](conference24.qmd) online conference 22 November - tickets are available by completing this [form](https://forms.office.com/e/NBcjv7LVJ4)

[Coffee and Coding](https://events.nhsrcommunity.com/coffee-and-code/) - occurs every other week on alternating days. Details on the sessions, where recording are shared and how to join are in <https://nhsrway.nhsrcommunity.com/community-handbook.html#coffee-and-coding>
